description:
Safe and effective for maintaining hard-to-clean containers, the natural ingredients leave you with nothing but great tasting water. No harsh chemicals, elbow grease, or appliances required, simply fill your container with warm water, add a Bottle Bright tablet, agitate, wait 20 minutes, rinse, and you're set.

  • Biodegradable ingredients contain no chlorine or harsh chemicals
  • For each item sold, Clean Ethics gives the same amount of Bottle Bright to people in need of clean water containers
name: Bottle Bright Cleaning Tablets 12 Pack
